hedline.hl1: Bozell, Jacobs Puts Two on Taco Bell

block.p: The Bozell Worldwide unit of Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardtappointed two executives yesterday who had previously led other agencies to manage its important Taco Bell account.

The executives are Harvey Hoffenberg, 45, former chairman and chief creative officer of Saatchi & Saatchi Advertising Worldwide in New York, a unit of Cordiant P.L.C., and Peter Stranger, 46, former president of Stranger & Associates in Los Angeles, now part of the Los Angeles office of the Evans Group. They were named to co-manage the Taco Bell business at Bozell/Salvati Montgomery Sakoda in Cosa Mesa, Calif., as executive vice presidents and heads of the creative and management teams, respectively.
The Bozell Worldwide unit of Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardtappointed two executives yesterday who had previously led other agencies to manage its important Taco Bell account.

The executives are Harvey Hoffenberg, 45, former chairman and chief creative officer of Saatchi & Saatchi Advertising Worldwide in New York, a unit of Cordiant P.L.C., and Peter Stranger, 46, former president of Stranger & Associates in Los Angeles, now part of the Los Angeles office of the Evans Group. They were named to co-manage the Taco Bell business at Bozell/Salvati Montgomery Sakoda in Cosa Mesa, Calif., as executive vice presidents and heads of the creative and management teams, respectively.

Mr. Hoffenberg and Mr. Stranger succeed Mel Newhoff, 54, who continues as an executive vice president and will focus on Bozell's corporate growth plans, working with Charles D. Peebler Jr., chief executive. Mr. Hoffenberg, who had been consulting on the Taco Bell account for several months, and Mr. Stranger both have fast-food account experience, Mr. Hoffenberg with Burger King, a unit of Grand Metropolitan P.L.C., and Mr. Stranger with Carl's Jr., a unit of CKE Restaurants Inc. Bozell shares the estimated $150 million account of Taco Bell, a unit of Pepsico Inc., with the Richards Group in Dallas. THE MEDIA BUSINESS: ADVERTISING -- ADDENDA
